cause.description:
the topics are::
-Mazere3 Sheb3a is a Lebanese country so we will make a war at Israel
-Save the lebanese army and lebanese people from the USA and her Allies
-Aoun for presidency is the last chance for revive lebanon and to take his independence
1. Mazere3 Sheb3a is a Lebanese country so we will make a war at Israel
2. Save the lebanese army and lebanese people from the USA and her Allies
3. General Aoun for presidency is the last chance for revive lebanon and to take his independence
cause.mission: Save lebanon from the USA and Israel and Syria
cause.name: Save the Lebanese Resistance
